basic.description:
Practical work in selected areas of performance.  
NOTE    Not offered every year. Prerequisites vary depending on specific course content; consult Department.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36Pc;48G;36P)
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Special Topics/Performance II

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    Level 3 and (reg in a DRAM Major or Medial Plan, or COCA-CODR Sub-Plan, or STSC Spec. Plan) and (a grade of B- in DRAM237) and (a GPA of 2.60 in DRAM) or permission of the Department).
